descriptionText.attr1: The second object to be settled by humans in this area of space. The first being the asteroid that now contains the Palm base.

Karakum is now one of two remaining MU bases. The others (most notably Nottingham) were recently abandoned due to the combination of damage during the MU rebellion, ever decreasing yield and the new civilian (and often pirate) bases offering better opportunities.

Karakum is now forced to compete against corporate mining bases and a non-stop flow of independent miners, who are willing to rent mining ships and risk heavy losses due to piracy, in the hopes of one day striking it rich.
